original: Lindberg, Bengt Jacob, docent, överläkare, Göteborg, f. 28/3/04 i Gävle av kont :chef Helmer L. o. Ester Sjödin. G. 32 m. Sara Ternell. Barn: Göran f. 33, Karin 35, Gunvor 39. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 23, med. kand. 27, med. lic. 32 o. med. dr 38, allt i Lund. Assist :läk. v. Sahlgr. sjukh. kir. avd. 29-30, e. läk. v. med. o. psykiatr. klin. i Lund 32-33, tf. andre und:läk. v. Tranås kuranst. 33, und:läk. v. pens :styr. avd. f, nervöst sjuka v. Malmö allm. sjukh. 33- 34, und:läk. v. sjukh. psykiatr. avd. 34-37, e. o. aman. v. pediatr. klin. i Lund 37, doc. i psykiatri v. Lunds univ. 38, doc. i psykologi o. psykiatri v. Gbgs högsk. sed. 40, kompetentförkl. t. professur i psykiatri 43, förste und :läk. v. Sahlgr. sjukh. psykiatr. avd. 39, bitr. överläk. där 40 o. överläk. sed. 46. Skr.: avh. o. upps. i psykiatri o. neurologi samt psykologi.
translated: Lindberg, Bengt Jacob, docent, consultant, Gothenburg, b. 28/3/04 in Gävle to father: head Helmer L. and mother Ester Sjödin. Married in 1932 to Sara Ternell. Children: Göran b. 1933, Karin b. 1935, Gunvor b. 1939. - Student:examination in Gothenburg in 1923, medical degree in 1927, medical license in 1932, and medical doctorate in 1938, all in Lund. Assistant physician at Sahlgren Hospital surgical department from 1929 to 1930, resident physician at medical and psychiatric clinic in Lund from 1932 to 1933, acting junior attending physician at Tranås sanatorium in 1933, and physician at the neurological department of Malmö general hospital from 1933 to 1934. Physician at the psychiatric department of a hospital from 1934 to 1937, extra assistant at the pediatric clinic in Lund from 1937, docent in psychiatry at Lund University in 1938, docent in psychology and psychiatry at Gothenburg's university since 1940, appointed for a professorship in psychiatry in 1943, senior attending physician at Sahlgren Hospital psychiatric department from 1939, assistant chief physician there from 1940, and chief physician since 1946. Published dissertations and papers in psychiatry, neurology, and psychology.

workExperience.name: Appointed for a Professorship in Psychiatry
